column6: Worlds come apart, realities are endangered and the lives of millions hang in the balance as The Sleeper wakes...  Neil Gaiman and John Romita Jr. deliver a mind-blowing story of cosmic proportions.  With Ikaris dead, can the other Eternals put the pieces of their mysterious dreams together?
column8: | penciller (cover):Rick Berry | writer:Neil Gaiman | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | letterer:Todd Klein | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller:John Romita JR.
